original_text: And the rest of the people he delivered into the hand of Abishai his brother, that he might put them in array against the children of Ammon.
korean_text: 그 백성의 남은 자를 그 아우 아비새의 수하에 맡겨 암몬 자손과 싸우려고 진 치게 하고

sentences.original_text: And the rest of the people
he delivered into the hand of Abishai his brother
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 형제 아비새의 손에 넘겨주었으니

sentences.original_text: that he might put them in array
